frontmatter.title: Decentralized finance (DeFi)
frontmatter.description: An overview of DeFi on Ethereum
summaryPoints: A global, open alternative to the current financial system.
Products that let you borrow, save, invest, trade, and more.
Based on open-source technology that anyone can program with.
